title: Cooking Game Sound Pack
description: Elevate your culinary gaming experience with 1639 expertly-crafted sound effects, designed for cooking and restaurant games. Sizzle, chop, and serve with authenticity.
longDescription:
🔈View Sound List

🔈View Video Demo

Introducing the "Cooking Game Sound Pack," an extensive collection of 1639 meticulously crafted sound effects, meticulously designed to transform your culinary gaming experience into a mouthwatering adventure.

This comprehensive pack includes 472 kitchen, food, and cooking-related sound effects, perfectly tailored for the immersive world of culinary games. You'll find a smorgasbord of sounds that capture the essence of a bustling restaurant kitchen, sizzling pans, chopping boards, and the delightful clatter of dishes being prepared. These sounds will transport your players into the heart of a bustling kitchen, adding authenticity and depth to your gameplay.

In addition to the culinary sounds, the pack also offers 50 ambiance sounds, setting the perfect mood for various kitchen and restaurant settings. Whether you're in a cozy family restaurant or a high-end culinary establishment, these ambiences will bring your game's environment to life.

To enhance the overall gaming experience, you'll have access to a diverse array of sounds. There are 200 door, window, and drawer sounds, 390 distinct footsteps sounds, 260 whoosh sounds, and 264 UI menu sounds. These sounds are versatile and can be seamlessly integrated into different aspects of your game, from character movements to user interface interactions.

If you're developing a cooking or restaurant simulation game, the "Cooking Game Sound Pack" is the ultimate resource to bring the flavors and sounds of the kitchen to your players. With a wide array of sound effects at your fingertips, you can create a gaming experience that's as satisfying to the ears as it is to the palate.

Prepare to embark on a culinary journey with the "Cooking Game Sound Pack" and turn your cooking game into a delightful and immersive experience. Whether you're flipping pancakes, simmering sauces, or serving up a five-star meal, these sounds will elevate your game to the next level, making it a feast for the senses.

Let the sizzle, clang, and aroma of the kitchen draw your players into the captivating world of culinary delights. Elevate your cooking game today with the "Cooking Game Sound Pack."
technicalDetails:
Audio file types: .Wav

Sample rate: 44,100Hz Sample Rate

Bit depth: 320Kbps Bit rate

Additional: Stereo

Do Sound Fx Loop: Yes

Windows and Mac: Yes

Support Dev Platform: Yes

-Dynamic sound

-Well organized
